Description: Upper section of a granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, wearing sun disc, the edges of the dorsal column are moulded and the top rounded off. Uraeus broken from front of the disk. Both arms lost. The straps of the dress are decorated with rosettes.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
